jobs.description: Created a UX prototype for a new AWS service, gathering early stakeholder feedback, uncovering technical constraints, defining data models, and delivering UX-approved JSX code.
Built frontend components in Material Design. Designed and prototyped "Brand your console", a feature that lets IT administrators customize Service Catalog's theme colors.
Worked on the world's most versatile e-book previewer. Highlights include a modular SASS framework, and a lightweight widget you can embed anywhere.
Worked on websites, web apps and mobile games, doing UI design, visual design, front-end development, tooling, Node.JS servers, devops, and agile methodologies.
Designed and developed a large-scale Wordpress portal, as well as various custom plugins tailored to the client’s particular needs.
Created an HTML5 game programming library. Blink’s component-oriented API and extensive feature set gave my team a critical advantage in time-constrained game jams.
Helped architect and develop a web-based CRM. The app crunches large volumes of medical data into helpful charts that assist DentalChile's CEO in decision-making.
Taught a Java mobile game programming course and co-founded a local chapter of the USM Games organization.
Designed and coded personal portfolios, educational websites, online catalogs, etc. I worked with individuals and companies alike, both local and foreign.
